title: Outdoor Oklahoma
additional-notes: This publication was titled Oklahoma Game and Fish News from 1945 to 1957, and Oklahoma Wildlife from 1957 to 1965.

Spot-checks of issues from before 1989 did not turn up issue copyright notices, though copyright notices may have appeared on some specific contributions. The masthead of some issues grants permission to reprint material with credit, if it is not done for advertising or commercial purposes.
